trans-unit.source: apply() at last is to save the changes. If you get error from apply(), change it to commit(). So this alternative sentence is
trans-unit.target: apply() 最后是保存更改。如果您从 apply() 获得错误，请将其更改为 commit() 。所以这个替代句子是

trans-unit.source: lsp will be -1 if preference_file_key has no value. If 'preference_file_key' has a value, it will return the value of this.
trans-unit.target: lsp 如果 preference_file_key 没有值，则lsp将为 -1 。如果“ preference_file_key”具有值，它将返回该值。

trans-unit.source: apply() was added in 2.3 and doesn't return any value either on success or failure. It saves values to SharedPreferences immediately but starts an asynchronous commit. More detail is here.
trans-unit.target: apply() 在2.3中添加了 apply（），无论成功还是失败都不会返回任何值。它将立即将值保存到SharedPreferences，但是开始异步提交。更多细节在这里。

trans-unit.source: commit() return true if value saved successfully otherwise false. It save values to SharedPreferences synchronously.
trans-unit.target: commit() 如果成功保存值，则 commit（）返回 true ，否则返回 false 。它将值同步保存到SharedPreferences中。

trans-unit.source: I have created a Helper class to make my Life easy. This is a generic class and has a-lot of methods those are commonly used in Apps like Shared Preferences, Email Validity, Date Time Format. Copy this class in your code and access it's methods wherever you need.
trans-unit.target: 我创建了一个Helper类,让我的生活更轻松。这是一个通用的类,它有很多在Apps中常用的方法,如共享首选项、邮件有效性、日期时间格式等。把这个类复制到你的代码中,然后在你需要的地方访问它的方法。

trans-unit.source: I want to store a time value and need to retrieve and edit it. How can I use SharedPreferences to do this?
trans-unit.target: 我想存储一个时间值，需要检索和编辑它。如何使用 SharedPreferences 做到这一点？

trans-unit.source: I wanted to add here that most of the snippets for this question will have something like MODE_PRIVATE when using SharedPreferences. Well, MODE_PRIVATE means that whatever you write into this shared preference can only be read by your application only.
trans-unit.target: 我想在这里补充一下,在使用SharedPreferences的时候,这个问题的大部分代码段都会有类似于MODE_PRIVATE的东西。那么,MODE_PRIVATE意味着无论你写到这个共享首选项中的任何东西都只能被你的应用程序读取。

trans-unit.source: If you are making a large application with other developers in your team and intend to have everything well organized without scattered code or different SharedPreferences instances, you may do something like this:
trans-unit.target: 如果你正在和团队中的其他开发人员一起做一个大型的应用程序,并且打算把所有的东西都组织得很好,没有分散的代码或不同的SharedPreferences实例,你可以这样做。

trans-unit.source: Using singelton class to access/update SharedPreferences
trans-unit.target: 使用singelton类来访问updateSharedPreferences

trans-unit.source: Using this simple library, here is how you make the calls to SharedPreferences..
trans-unit.target: 使用这个简单的库，这里是您如何调用SharedPreferences的方法。

trans-unit.source: Whatever key you pass to getSharedPreferences() method, android creates a file with that name and stores the preference data into it. Also remember that getSharedPreferences() is supposed to be used when you intend to have multiple preference files for your application. If you intend to use single preference file and store all key-value pairs into it then use the getSharedPreference() method. Its weird why everyone (including myself) simply uses getSharedPreferences() flavor without even understanding the difference between the above two.
trans-unit.target: 无论你传递给getSharedPreferences()方法的是什么键,android都会创建一个带有该名称的文件,并将偏好数据存储到其中。另外,请记住,getSharedPreferences()方法应该是在你打算为你的应用程序拥有多个偏好文件时使用。如果你打算使用单一的首选项文件,并将所有的键值对存储到其中,那么就使用getSharedPreference()方法。很奇怪,为什么大家(包括我自己)都只是简单地使用getSharedPreferences()方法,而不了解上述两种方法的区别。

trans-unit.source: With the SharedPreference instance one can retrieve the int value of the any preference with the getInt(String key, int defVal). The preference we are interested in this case is counter .
trans-unit.target: 使用 SharedPreference 实例，可以使用getInt（String key，int defVal）检索任何首选项的int值。在这种情况下，我们感兴趣的偏好是对立的。

trans-unit.source: apply() is asynchronus save, doesn't return anything, it update value in memory first & changes are written to disk later asynchronusly.
trans-unit.target: <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">apply（）是异步保存的，不返回任何内容，它首先更新内存中的值，然后将更改异步地写入磁盘。</font></font>

trans-unit.source: commit() is synchronus save, it return true/false based on outcome. Changes are written to disk synchronusly
trans-unit.target: commit()是同步保存,它根据结果返回trueefalse。变更是同步写到磁盘上的
